name: TARBALL
description:
This is a first game made by Electric Eel Studio.

It's a short first person shooter without big lore. You're the robot that must hit 15 targets to win. 

  • Programming - NETIK
  • Idea - NETIK
  • Models - CIP_
  • Music - CIP_
  • VFX and Voice - Zvukogram.com
  • Engine - Unreal Engine 4
